product_name: Black Diamond Soloist Fingers Insulated Gloves
long_description: Your go-to gloves for technical alpine climbing in extremely cold weather, these gloves combine waterproof inserts with removable insulated liners for versatile protection when conditions get wet.
short_description: Your go-to gloves for technical alpine climbing in extremely cold weather, these gloves combine waterproof inserts with removable insulated liners for versatile protection when conditions get wet.
